roleCaption: Full Stack Developer in constant evolution, always looking for new challenges.
skillsCaption: Over the years, I have developed practical and solid skills in various areas of web development. I enjoy continuous learning and improving both my technical and organizational abilities. Among my strengths are adaptability to different projects, attention to detail, and a strong focus on finding practical and efficient solutions. I am confident with the technologies I use daily and always open to new challenges to keep growing.
worksCaption: Here you can find a selection of projects I have worked on. Some were developed for clients, while others are personal projects or experiments born from my desire to improve. Each project represents an opportunity I embraced to refine my technical and creative skills, always aiming to build functional, well-crafted solutions tailored to each project's needs.

sognando-casa.description: E-commerce platform selling building materials (mainly tiles). I developed the entire structure, from frontend to backend.

dimora.description: E-commerce platform selling building materials (mainly tiles). I developed the entire structure, from frontend to backend.

builder-be-shoppy.description: Centralized management system for e-commerce platforms: product creation, customer management, orders, inventory, payments, and shipping.

reasy-gen.description: Online content generator structured around applications, currently under development.
